channel.title: Friends on EXIA's Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Friends on EXIA's Garden

item.title: ðŸ”Ž Finding Meaning In Life With Friends And Family
item.description: Friends and family are the most important part of my life, like for many others. I cannot imagine my life without these people. Although it’s hard to explain what they mean to me or how friends and family can give your life meaning but, Here’s what I have. I might not be able to formulate all my thoughts properly, So I might add another post in the future. They Love Me For Who I’m> They Love Me For Who I’m # Friends and family love you for who you are.
